name: Shaey Kayr
content:
Shaey Kayr was a Human male present on the Wookiee world of Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War in 1.5 ABY. He was an explorer and had begun his trek across Kashyyyk by first taking in the sights of the Kkowir Forest.
Shaey Kayr appears in the Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided expansion pack Rage of the Wookiees. His purpose is to give the player general information about the major points of interest within the Kkowir Forest.
